verses.verse: For Zion's <WH6726> sake will I not hold my peace <WH2814>, and for Jerusalem's <WH3389> sake I will not rest <WH8252>, until the righteousness <WH6664> thereof go forth <WH3318> as brightness <WH5051>, and the salvation <WH3444> thereof as a lamp <WH3940> that burneth <WH1197>.

And the Gentiles <WH1471> shall see <WH7200> thy righteousness <WH6664>, and all kings <WH4428> thy glory <WH3519>: and thou shalt be called <WH7121> by a new <WH2319> name <WH5344>, which the mouth <WH6310> of the LORD <WH3068> shall name <WH8034>.
Thou shalt also be a crown <WH5850> of glory <WH8597> in the hand <WH3027> of the LORD <WH3068>, and a royal <WH4410> diadem <WH6797> <WH6797> in the hand <WH3709> of thy God <WH430>.

Thou shalt no more be termed <WH559> Forsaken <WH5800>; neither shall thy land <WH776> any more be termed <WH559> Desolate <WH8077>: but thou shalt be called <WH7121> Hephzibah <WH2657>, and thy land <WH776> Beulah <WH1166>: for the LORD <WH3068> delighteth <WH2654> in thee, and thy land <WH776> shall be married <WH1166>. Hephzibah: that is, My delight is in her Beulah: that is, Married

For as a young man <WH970> marrieth <WH1166> a virgin <WH1330>, so shall thy sons <WH1121> marry <WH1166> thee: and as the bridegroom <WH2860> rejoiceth <WH4885> over the bride <WH3618>, so shall thy God <WH430> rejoice <WH7797> over thee. as the: Heb. with the joy of the bridegroom

I have set <WH6485> watchmen <WH8104> upon thy walls <WH2346>, O Jerusalem <WH3389>, which shall never <WH8548> hold their peace <WH2814> day <WH3117> nor night <WH3915>: ye that make mention <WH2142> of the LORD <WH3068>, keep not silence <WH1824>, make: or, are the LORD's remembrancers
And give <WH5414> him no rest <WH1824>, till he establish <WH3559>, and till he make <WH7760> Jerusalem <WH3389> a praise <WH8416> in the earth <WH776>. rest: Heb. silence

The LORD <WH3068> hath sworn <WH7650> by his right hand <WH3225>, and by the arm <WH2220> of his strength <WH5797>, Surely I will <WH518> no more give <WH5414> thy corn <WH1715> to be meat <WH3978> for thine enemies <WH341>; and the sons <WH1121> of the stranger <WH5236> shall not drink <WH8354> thy wine <WH8492>, for the which thou hast laboured <WH3021>: Surely: Heb. If I give, etc

But they that have gathered <WH622> it shall eat <WH398> it, and praise <WH1984> the LORD <WH3068>; and they that have brought it together <WH6908> shall drink <WH8354> it in the courts <WH2691> of my holiness <WH6944>.

Go through <WH5674>, go through <WH5674> the gates <WH8179>; prepare <WH6437> ye the way <WH1870> of the people <WH5971>; cast up <WH5549>, cast up <WH5549> the highway <WH4546>; gather out <WH5619> the stones <WH68>; lift up <WH7311> a standard <WH5251> for the people <WH5971>.

Behold, the LORD <WH3068> hath proclaimed <WH8085> unto the end <WH7097> of the world <WH776>, Say <WH559> ye to the daughter <WH1323> of Zion <WH6726>, Behold, thy salvation <WH3468> cometh <WH935>; behold, his reward <WH7939> is with him, and his work <WH6468> before <WH6440> him. work: or, recompence

And they shall call <WH7121> them, The holy <WH6944> people <WH5971>, The redeemed <WH1350> of the LORD <WH3068>: and thou shalt be called <WH7121>, Sought out <WH1875>, A city <WH5892> not forsaken <WH5800>.
